origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SharpAPI.analyze_disruption_events', 'description': 'This function analyzes the supply chain disruption events for a specified company over a given number of years, focusing on specific advanced manufacturing technologies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., Sharp.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years to analyze data for.'}, {'name': 'technology', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of advanced manufacturing technologies to focus on, e.g., 液晶面板, 智能制造.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'disruption_analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of supply chain disruption events for the specified company and technologies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SharpAPI.analyze_disruption_events, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Sharp', 'years'是'5', 'technology'是['液晶面板', '智能制造'].
